Interface EventService

extends Service<EventDTO>
    EventService interface. Implement all methods in concrete EventService

      • getSorted

        java.util.List<EventDTO> getSorted​(java.lang.String query)
                            throws ServiceException
        Calls DAO to get sorted, filtered and limited list of DTOs
        Parameters:
        query - - to obtain necessary DTOs
        Returns:
        List of EventDTOs that match demands
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes

      • getSortedByUser

        java.util.List<EventDTO> getSortedByUser​(java.lang.String query,
                                         Role role)
                                  throws ServiceException
        Calls DAO to get sorted, filtered and limited list of DTOs where Visitor or Speaker participate
        Parameters:
        query - - to obtain necessary DTOs
        role - - can be VISITOR or SPEAKER
        Returns:
        List of EventDTOs that match demands
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes

      • getNumberOfRecords

        int getNumberOfRecords​(java.lang.String filter,
                       Role role)
                throws ServiceException
        Calls DAO to get number of all records match filter
        Parameters:
        filter - - conditions for such Events
        role - - can be VISITOR or SPEAKER or any other
        Returns:
        number of records that match demands
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes

      • setVisitorsCount

        void setVisitorsCount​(java.lang.String eventIdString,
                      java.lang.String visitorsCountString)
               throws ServiceException
        Calls DAO to update Event visitor number
        Parameters:
        eventIdString - - id as a String to validate and convert to long
        visitorsCountString - - visitors as a String to validate and convert to int
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes
